Package sage.networking.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IClientInfo
    General data structure to store client information necessary to implement the IClientInfo.sendPacket(Serializable).
    IGameConnectionServer
    Defines the server side for a game.
    IServerSocket
    Defines a server side socket.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGameConnectionServer<K>
    Abstract class to define the protected methods necessary for a game connection server.
    GameConnectionServer<K>
    A concrete implementation of a game server.
    TCPClientInfo
    Implementation of IClientInfo used for TCP protocol.
    TCPServerSocket
    A TCP implementation of a IServerSocket.
    UDPClientInfo
    Implementation of IClientInfo used for UDP protocol.
    UDPServerSocket
    A UDP implementation of a IServerSocket.
